Class DataCollectionService

java.lang.Object
com.kf7014.smartcitymicroservice.service.DataCollectionService
@Service public class DataCollectionService extends Object
Service responsible for collecting meter readings from external providers and storing them in the database.

This service periodically fetches data from configured providers using scheduled tasks, processes the retrieved meter readings, and persists them to MongoDB.

The collectData() method is scheduled to run every 5 minutes, iterating through each configured provider, fetching new readings since the last recorded timestamp, and storing them.

Handles potential duplicate entries by catching DuplicateKeyException and logging appropriate messages.

Utilizes WebClient for reactive HTTP requests to external provider APIs.

Since:
2024-11-27
Version:
1.0
Author:
Muhammad Naqvi

  • Method Details

    • collectData

      @Scheduled(fixedRate=300000L) public void collectData()
      Scheduled task that collects meter readings from all configured providers every 5 minutes.

      Iterates through each provider defined in ProviderProperties, fetches new meter readings since the last recorded timestamp, and stores them in the database.
